SELECT
wms_inventory.*, t_sku_product.sku_name as skuName, t_sku_product.bar_code as skuBarcode, t_sku_product.sku_code as skuCode, t_sku_product.field1 as skuUnit, wms_warehouse.warehouse_name FROM wms_inventory left join t_sku_product on t_sku_product.id = wms_inventory.sku_id left join wms_warehouse on wms_warehouse.id = wms_inventory.warehouse_id WHERE 1=1
AND wms_inventory.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND wms_warehouse.warehouse_name = #{warehouseName}
AND t_sku_product.sku_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{skuName},'%')
AND wms_inventory.warehouse_id = #{record.warehouseId}
AND wms_inventory.warehouse_id = #{record.warehouseId} AND( t_sku_product.sku_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') or t_sku_product.bar_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_sku_product.sku_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') )
AND( t_sku_product.sku_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') or t_sku_product.bar_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_sku_product.sku_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') )
AND wms_inventory.slot_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.slotId},'%')
AND wms_inventory.max_inventory LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.maxInventory},'%')
AND wms_inventory.min_inventory LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.minInventory},'%')
AND wms_inventory.sku_id = #{record.skuId}
AND wms_inventory.valid_sku LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.validSku},'%')
AND wms_inventory.advance_quantities LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.advanceQuantities},'%')
AND wms_inventory.transmit_quantities LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.transmitQuantities},'%')

SELECT sin.sku_id AS skuId, sin.type, sin.relation_code as relationCode, sin.transaction_sku_price AS transactionSkuPrice, sin.transaction_quantities AS transactionQuantities, sin.transaction_time AS transactionTime, sin.after_transaction_quantities AS validValue, sin.before_transaction_quantities AS beforeTransactionQuantities, t_sku_product.sku_name AS skuName, t_sku_product.bar_code AS skuBarcode, t_sku_product.sku_code AS skuCode, t_sku_product.field1 AS skuUnit, wms_warehouse.warehouse_name AS warehouseName, wms_storage_in.transaction_type AS transactionType, wms_storage_in.transaction_code AS transactionCode, 'sin' recordType, wms_storage_in.`status` AS resultType,
CASE WHEN (ISNULL(wms_storage_in.field1) OR wms_storage_in.field1 = '') THEN wms_storage_in.id ELSE wms_storage_in.field1 END AS parentId
FROM wms_storage_in_item sin LEFT JOIN wms_storage_in ON sin.storage_in_id = wms_storage_in.id LEFT JOIN t_sku_product ON t_sku_product.id = sin.sku_id LEFT JOIN wms_warehouse ON wms_warehouse.id = wms_storage_in.warehouse_id
WHERE 1 = 1 AND t_sku_product.id = #{skuId} AND wms_warehouse.warehouse_name = #{warehouseName} AND (sin.type = 'StorageIn' and wms_storage_in.`status`in ('Done','Closed')) and wms_storage_in.transaction_type = #{transactionType}
AND sin.transaction_time >= date(#{startTime}) AND sin.transaction_time < DATE_ADD(date(#{endTime}),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND wms_storage_in.transaction_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{transactionCode},'%')
UNION
SELECT sout.sku_id AS skuId, NULL AS type, sout.relation_code as relationCode, sout.transaction_sku_price AS transactionSkuPrice, sout.transaction_quantities AS transactionQuantities, sout.transaction_time AS transactionTime, sout.after_transaction_quantities AS validValue, sout.before_transaction_quantities AS beforeTransactionQuantities, t_sku_product.sku_name AS skuName, t_sku_product.bar_code AS skuBarcode, t_sku_product.sku_code AS skuCode, t_sku_product.field1 AS skuUnit, wms_warehouse.warehouse_name AS warehouseName, wms_storage_out.transaction_type AS transactionType, wms_storage_out.transaction_code AS transactionCode, 'sout' recordType, wms_storage_out.`status` AS resultType,
CASE WHEN (ISNULL(wms_storage_out.field1) OR wms_storage_out.field1 = '') THEN wms_storage_out.id ELSE wms_storage_out.field1 END AS parentId
FROM wms_storage_out_item sout LEFT JOIN wms_storage_out ON sout.storage_out_id = wms_storage_out.id LEFT JOIN t_sku_product ON t_sku_product.id = sout.sku_id LEFT JOIN wms_warehouse ON wms_warehouse.id = wms_storage_out.warehouse_id
WHERE 1 = 1 AND t_sku_product.id = #{skuId} AND wms_warehouse.warehouse_name = #{warehouseName} and (sout.type='STORAGEOUT' and wms_storage_out.`status` in ('Done','Closed')) and wms_storage_out.transaction_type = #{transactionType}
AND sout.transaction_time >= date(#{startTime}) AND sout.transaction_time < DATE_ADD(date(#{endTime}),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND wms_storage_out.transaction_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{transactionCode},'%')
SELECT csku.sku_id AS skuId, NULL AS type, wms_check.check_code as relationCode, NULL AS transactionSkuPrice, csku.profit_lost AS transactionQuantities, wms_check.finish_time AS transactionTime,
csku.fact_quantities AS validValue, null as beforeTransactionQuantities, t_sku_product.sku_name AS skuName, t_sku_product.bar_code AS skuBarcode, t_sku_product.sku_code AS skuCode, t_sku_product.field1 AS skuUnit, wms_warehouse.warehouse_name AS warehouseName, 'checkUpdate' transactionType, NULL AS transactionCode, CASE WHEN csku.profit_lost>0 THEN 'sin' ELSE 'sout' END AS recordType,
wms_check.`status` AS resultType, csku.check_id as parentId
FROM wms_check_sku csku LEFT JOIN wms_check ON (csku.check_id = wms_check.id ) LEFT JOIN wms_warehouse ON csku.warehouse_id = wms_warehouse.id LEFT JOIN t_sku_product ON t_sku_product.id = csku.sku_id
WHERE 1 = 1
AND csku.profit_lost != 0 AND t_sku_product.id = #{skuId} AND wms_warehouse.warehouse_name = #{warehouseName} and wms_check.`status` = 'Done'
AND wms_check.finish_time >= date(#{startTime}) AND wms_check.finish_time < DATE_ADD(date(#{endTime}),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND wms_check.check_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{transactionCode},'%')

csku.fact_quantities AS validValue, null as beforeTransactionQuantities, t_sku_product.sku_name AS skuName, t_sku_product.bar_code AS skuBarcode, t_sku_product.sku_code AS skuCode, t_sku_product.field1 AS skuUnit, wms_warehouse.warehouse_name AS warehouseName, 'checkUpdate' transactionType, NULL AS transactionCode,
CASE
